posts.post_content:
Posted By: Stephen
Hello, 

I am looking to buy T3 PSA 1 commons for $150 shipped to Miami ... If you have any send me a scan and I will most likely buy right away. Thanks

email address is putman1021@yahoo.com

Posted By: Ted Sherman
You might be able to pick up PSA graded "authentics" for $150, the same as I have been doing.  They count as a PSA 1 in the registry.  Now that each one is SIXTY bucks to grade, the prices are going up [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/sad.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Jason L
a T3 now costs $60 to get it graded?!!?!?

I don't collect them, so I have never paid attention to it before.  That seems more than a little ridiculous.

Sorry to interrupt, Steven.
Good luck with your search.
Jason

Posted By: Ted Sherman
Yes 60 bucks now at PSA, not sure at SGC what it is.  Of course you can always call and ask for a discount....:)I cracked TWO sgc 1.5's and PSA labeled them "authentic"  so at least 120 down the drain, 60 once, and 60..... eventually..... twice HOPEFULLY with a GRADE this time UGGGGHHH

Posted By: Matt
SGC charges $50.  Expensive plastic.

Posted By: Mark
Stephen,
I have a T3 Paskert PSA 1 available.  It's yours for $150 if you want it.

Mark

Posted By: Stephen
Hello Mark, 

Yes I am interested....my email address is putman2110@yahoo.com please send me an email regarding the paypal account and I will make the payment tonight. Thanks!

Posted By: Ted Sherman
email sent
